text: Simon Montagu McBurney (born 25 August 1957) is an English actor, playwright, and theatre and opera director. He is the founder and artistic director of the Théâtre de Complicité, London. He played Cecil in BBC's The Vicar of Dibley (1994–2004). McBurney had roles in the movies The Manchurian Candidate (2004), Friends with Money, The Last King of Scotland (both 2006), The Golden Compass (2007), The Duchess (2008), Robin Hood, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 1 (both 2010), Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy (2011), Magic in the Moonlight, The Theory of Everything (both 2014), Mission: Impossible – Rogue Nation (2015) and in Nosferatu (2024). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Cambridgeshire Category:People from Cambridge Category:English theatre directors Category:English playwrights
title: Simon McBurney
